name: Vegetarian Platter
description: An ultimate Mediterranean appetizer platter loaded with hummus, red pepper dip, pita chips, veggie sticks, feta cheese, falafel, olives, and figs.

name: Pizza
description: Flattened disk of bread dough topped with some combination of olive oil, oregano, tomato, olives, mozzarella or other cheese

name: Baked fish
description: Spices, garlic, basil ribbons, olive oil and lemon juice.

name: Cheese Pasta
description: Tossed with four kinds of cheese and different spices to make this creamy casserole dish.

name: Meatball
description: Ground meat rolled into a ball, along with other ingredients, such as bread crumbs, minced onion, eggs, butter, and seasoning.

name: Berry French Toast
description: This dish is filled with delicious berries to make for an appetising meal at any time of the day!

name: Greek Salad
description: Consists of sliced cucumbers, tomatoes, green bell pepper, red onion, olives, and feta cheese.

name: Dumpling
description: Delicate, bite-sized treats of different fillings wrapped in a thin layer of dough.
